data.name: Energy Engine PC Live Wallpaper
data.detailed_description:
Energy Engine PC Live Wallpaper


Manage the energy of your wallpaper.

Our new project Energy Engine is giving many options to release the energy of your wallpaper.
Many settings will allow you to create your own unique wallpaper.

Main features:


Interactive simulation - molecules that react to the mouse
Ready presets - presets divided into categories
Many editing options - you can change every object
Watch - adjust your watch to the screen
Own text - add your own text to the wallpaper
Game Mode - a resting pause for normal games
Optimization - reduced equipment requirements


Performance:
Productivity is our priority. The wallpaper has been adjusted to the best performance. This project has many options for the number of particles that affect performance. Everyone will match something for themselves. The project was created for desktops with a dedicated graphics card.

Multi, Wide, 4K screen users:
The wallpaper will run at a maximum resolution. Higher resolution can have a slight effect on your computer's performance. However, I have a 4K screen and the performance drop is insignificant. Wallpaper support multi-screen and include FOV camera sliders, so you set everything for even ultra wide setup.

Fake anti-virus reports:
Unfortunately, there is a "danger" that can be "dangerous". Not that it is there !. The problem here is the Steam. We are described in the "Community HUB" where you can find out what exactly is going on.

Please check out our "Community HUB".

Support
We are a small team that wants to create interactive applications that diversify known Windows wallpapers. We try to make each project unique, introducing something new on the screen. Each support is valuable for us. Ratings and comments help move forward and create even better interactive wallpapers.

Energy Engine PC Live Wallpaper is a project that was created thanks to your help. Thank you very much. Every help is very important to us. Thank you.

If you notice any problems, check our "Community HUB" or contact directly. I'm almost 25h to your disposition;)

Thank you for support!
3DM Team

data.short_description: Release the energy of your wallpaper. Create effects that react to your movement. Set your c to create a unique wallpaper suited to your PC set.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 Only
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 compatible GPU with at least 1GB of VRAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Windows 10 Only!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 Only
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4690K CPU @ 3.50GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050 or simillar
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Windows 10 Only!
